section.p: When communication problems caused the automatic payment processing for an organization to fail, you can re-invoke these payment processes manually.

p.b: To retry failed payment processes, choose one of the following options:

ul.li: administration portal - Choose Execute billing tasks in the Operation menu, and click Execute in the respective section of the Web page.

Command line tool - Use the retryfailedpaymentprocesses command with the following syntax:
<JAVA_HOME>/bin/java -jar lib/oscm-operatorsvc-client.jar <userkey> <password> retryfailedpaymentprocesses
